title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 50.3 - Accounting of moneys
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 50.3 - Accounting of moneys

State Regulations

On or before the 15th day of each month, the pilots licensed
by the commissioners shall render to the Secretary of the Board an accounting
of all moneys collected for pilotage during the preceding month and, for the
use of the commissioners as provided in subdivision 1 of section
95
of the

Navigation Law, shall pay the board such portions of said moneys, but not
exceeding three percentum thereof, as the commissioners may from time to time
deem to be required. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
50.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
